Package org.sat4j.specs

Interface IGroupSolver

All Superinterfaces:
IProblem, ISolver, RandomAccessModel, Serializable
All Known Implementing Classes:
DimacsOutputSolver, DimacsStringSolver, GroupClauseSelectorSolver, HighLevelXplain
public interface IGroupSolver extends ISolver
Represents a CNF in which clauses are grouped into levels. It was first used to build a high level MUS solver for SAT 2011 competition.
Since:
2.3.3
Author:
leberre

  • Method Details

    • addClause

      IConstr addClause​(IVecInt literals, int groupId) throws ContradictionException
      Parameters:
      literals - a clause
      groupId - the level of the clause set. The specific level 0 is used to denote hard clauses.
      Returns:
      on object representing that clause in the solver.
      Throws:
      ContradictionException

      Collection<Integer> getAddedVars()

      the list of Dimacs variables created for the group solver.
